summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5575 for the improvement of West Cloverdale Street, from 37th Avenue Southwest to 39th Avenue Southwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 73031, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
